device.overview: A performance-first flagship known for the 'Battery King' title in 2025, featuring industry-leading charging speeds.

specs.label: Display
specs.description: A stunning 2K resolution display with 165Hz refresh rate for the smoothest gaming experience.

specs.label: Camera
specs.description: Co-developed with Hasselblad for natural color calibration and superior portrait photography.

specs.label: Battery
specs.description: A massive silicon-carbon battery that supports 120W wired and 50W wireless charging.

specs.label: RAM
specs.description: Built for speed with the latest Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset integration.

specs.label: Storage
specs.description: UFS 4.1 storage offering lightning-fast data transfer and app loading.
